sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-referral', templateUrl: './referral.component.html', styleUrls: ['./referral.component.scss'] }) export class ReferralComponent implements OnInit{ ngOnInit(): void { } text = "Hello, I am an editable textarea. Hover and select me to see the editable textbox!" current_user: string = "username" referrer_name: string = "referrer's name" referral_link: string = "referral link" company_name: string = "company's name" company_web_address: string = "company's website address" review_image: string = "./../../assets/images/Design inspiration-bro.png" review_link: string = "" program_description: string = "" program_starting_date: string = "" program_due_date: string = "" program_period: Number = 180 program_reward: string = "Referral Program Rewards" } Document

Hi {{current_user}}!

Your friend {{referrer_name}} referred you to our referral program! Join now to enjoy exclusive benefits and rewards while sharing the love with your network. Here's how it works: Sign up using the unique referral link provided by {{referrer_name}}. Share your referral link with friends, family, and colleagues. When someone signs up or makes a purchase using your link, both you and the person you referred will receive a reward or discount. Click below to create your account and start referring: {{referral_link}} If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to our support team. Welcome aboard! {{company_name}}

Program Details

Introducing our new referral program at {{ company_name }}! Spread the word about our products/services and be rewarded for your support. Here's how it works:
  1. Refer: Tell your friends, family, or colleagues about {{ company_name }}.
  2. Purchase/Sign-Up: When they make a purchase or sign up, make sure they mention your name or use your unique referral code.
  3. Rewards: You'll receive {{ program_reward }} for each successful referral.
  4. Eligibility: All current customers/employees can participate. Referrals must be new customers/employees.
  5. Verification: Referrals will be verified within {{ program_period }} days.
  6. Redemption: Once verified, you'll receive instructions on how to claim your rewards.
  7. Program Duration: The referral program runs from {{ program_starting_date }} to {{ program_due_date }}.
  8. Thank you for your support. Refer today and start earning rewards!
  9. For any questions, contact our customer support team at {{ company_web_address }}.
{{ company_name }}

Purchase and Win a Holiday!

Ready to turn your travel dreams into reality? Visit VoyageScope now and enter our "Win a Dream Holiday" contest! Explore our curated travel packages, indulge in unforgettable experiences, and enjoy seamless arrangements. With each purchase, you automatically enter for a chance to win an incredible vacation package. Don't miss out! Start your journey today and get closer to winning the holiday of your dreams. Happy travels!

Sign up
